sourcesContent: import { Dropdown, Portlet, Widget8 } from "@panely/components" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import * as SolidIcon from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" class Widget21Component extends React.Component { state = { highlight: "34", title: "Proposals", color: "primary", detail: () => ( Completed: 8 ) } render() { const { highlight, title, color, detail: Detail } = this.state return ( Features {/* BEGIN Dropdown */} }> Report }> Charts }> Statistics {/* END Dropdown */} {/* BEGIN Widget */} {/* END Widget */} ) } } export default Widget21Component
